verses.name: Genesis 38:16
verses.text: And he turned unto her by the way, and said, Go to, I pray thee, let me come in unto thee; (for he knew not that she was his daughter in law.) And she said, What wilt thou give me, that thou mayest come in unto me?

verses.name: Genesis 38:17
verses.text: And he said, I will send thee a kid from the flock. And she said, Wilt thou give me a pledge, till thou send it?
